content: all-star mittens are knitted from charts using 2 colors at a time the background color/main color stays the same through out and you change the contrasting colors as you go to keep the knitting interesting but not too fussy yarn needed knit pick palette 100% wool fingering weight coriander heather mc 115 yds autumn heather 36 yds merlot heather 61 yds rainforest heather 20 yds
